mapper.select: SELECT RUM,PRJ_ID, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_START, PRJ_END, CLIENT, PRJ_STATE, ID, USER_NM, CODE_NM, PRJ_CODE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRJ_STATE ASC, PRJ_START DESC, A.PRJ_ID) AS RUM, A.PRJ_ID, A.PRJ_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(a.PRJ_START,'%Y-%m-%d') AS PRJ_START, DATE_FORMAT(a.PRJ_END,'%Y-%m-%d') AS PRJ_END, A.CLIENT, D.CODE_NM AS PRJ_STATE, B.ESNTL_ID AS ID, B.USER_NM, C.CODE_NM, A.PRJ_CODE FROM PROJECTS A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.ID = B.EMPLYR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON B.GRADE = C.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON A.PRJ_STATE = D.CODE ) P WHERE P.RUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
